content: Thank you for sharing this, it’s quite a well done, vivid piece! Every year on the anniversary of each of my parents’ passing, I write them a letter and share it with the world. I feel like it’s such a great way to honor them and all that they’ve brought to the world. It’s also a great way for me to continue healing and processing everything. I'm grateful for all the warm responses from my close friends, family, and passerbys. Your grandfather sounds like he was very imaginative and having that growing up is something to cherish lifelong in the form of memories. Though memories might fade and become changed over time, writing about them makes them immortal. It’s at the heart of what I enjoy about creative writing. You are lucky to have a grandfather like that!
